mapper.insert: INSERT INTO drive_report_tb (DRIVE_DATE, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM, UNIT_PRICE, QUANTITY, MEMO, PAYMENT_CHK, DRIVER_ID_FK, SUBMITTER_ID_FK, WRITER_ID_FK) VALUES (#{driveDate}, #{fromSite}, #{toSite}, #{item}, #{unitPrice}, #{quantity}, #{memo}, #{paymentChk}, #{driverIdFk}, #{submitterIdFk}, #{writerIdFk})
mapper.update: UPDATE drive_report_tb SET DRIVE_DATE = #{driveDate}, FROM_SITE = #{fromSite}, TO_SITE = #{toSite}, ITEM = #{item}, QUANTITY = #{quantity}, MEMO = #{memo}, PAYMENT_CHK = #{paymentChk}, PROGRESS = #{progress}, SUBMITTER_ID_FK = #{submitterIdFk} WHERE WRITER_ID_FK = #{writerIdFk} AND DRIVE_REPORT_ID = #{driveReportId} AND SUBMITTER_PAYMENT_CHK = 0
mapper.sql: WITH writer_reports AS (SELECT * FROM drive_report_tb WHERE WRITER_ID_FK = ${writerIdFk}), join_reports AS (SELECT * FROM driver_tb INNER JOIN writer_reports ON DRIVER_ID = writer_reports.DRIVER_ID_FK)
mapper.select:
SELECT DRIVE_REPORT_ID, CAR_NO, DATE_FORMAT(DRIVE_DATE, '%Y.%m.%d') AS driveDate, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM, QUANTITY, DRIVER_ID_FK FROM join_reports
WHERE DRIVE_DATE BETWEEN #{driveDate} AND #{driveDate}
mapper.sql: WITH writer_report AS (SELECT * FROM drive_report_tb WHERE SUBMITTER_ID_FK = ${writerIdFk} AND DRIVE_REPORT_ID = ${driveReportId}), join_report AS (SELECT * FROM driver_tb INNER JOIN r1 ON DRIVER_ID = r1.DRIVER_ID_FK)
mapper.select: SELECT DRIVE_REPORT_ID, DRIVER_ID_FK, CAR_NO AS receiver, DATE_FORMAT(DRIVE_DATE, '%Y-%m-%d') AS driveDate, FROM_SITE, TO_SITE, ITEM, UNIT_PRICE, QUANTITY, MEMO, PAYMENT_CHK, PROGRESS, POSTING_CHK FROM join_report
